resources.string: Welcome in AA AIO Tweaker\nThis utility will let you apply some tweaks to Android Auto\nSelect which tweaks you want to apply then patch :)

"This app can alter Android Auto behaviour and bypass some safety features that Google has implemented in Android Auto.\n By using this software, you agree that YOU, and ONLY YOU, are solely responsible for any possible consequence that may result in altering safety features such as injury to yourself and/or others, property damage, loss of life. Under no circumnstances is the author of this app responsible for its use"
This app has been developed by Shmykelsa

Status Legend:
GREEN= Patch applied
YELLOW= Patch need reboot to be applied
RED= Patch is not applied
